entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is happy to see Harry and gives him presents.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who gives him a present.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who receives presents from his friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who gives him a present.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who gives Harry a penknife with attachments.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a character who gives Harry a vast box of sweets.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a character who gives Harry a usual package with a new gift.

entities.name: dursleys'
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives.

relationships.description: Sirius gives Harry a penknife with attachments.
Hagrid gives Harry a vast box of sweets.
Mrs. Weasley gives Harry a usual package with a new gift.
